org.mmbase.cache.CachePolicy

  • Packages that use CachePolicy 
    Package Description
    org.mmbase.bridge.implementation
    This package provides the basic implementations for the interfaces of org.mmbase.bridge.
    org.mmbase.bridge.remote  
    org.mmbase.bridge.remote.proxy  
    org.mmbase.bridge.remote.rmi  
    org.mmbase.bridge.util
    This package contains several bridge related classes which can be used independently of the rest of MMBase.
    org.mmbase.cache
    The goal of this package is to centralize the MMBase caches.

    • Uses of CachePolicy in org.mmbase.cache

      Fields in org.mmbase.cache declared as CachePolicy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CachePolicy CachePolicy.ALWAYS
      Standard cache policy that advises to always cache a passed object.
      static CachePolicy CachePolicy.NEVER
      Standard cache policy that advises to never cache a passed object.
      Methods in org.mmbase.cache that return CachePolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CachePolicy Cacheable.getCachePolicy()
      Returns the CachePolicy of the object.
      static CachePolicy CachePolicy.getPolicy(Object policyKey)
      Obtains a cache policy given a policy key.

      static void CachePolicy.putPolicy(Object policyKey, CachePolicy policy)
